dims: number of rows, number of columns
attributes.doc: The shape (number of rows, number of columns) of this sparse matrix.
attributes.name: shape

dims: number of rows in the matrix + 1
datasets.name: indptr

datasets.doc: The non-zero values in the matrix.
datasets.name: data

groups.doc: A compressed sparse row matrix. Data are stored in the standard CSR format, where column indices for row i are stored in indices[indptr[i]:indptr[i+1]] and their corresponding values are stored in data[indptr[i]:indptr[i+1]].
